review: So far I think it's great to have!
author: Arlene Franklin

review: Very good product...easy to connect to the television and so far all services have connected quickly without any problems.  I would recommend this to anyone.
author: Anita Byrd-Petts

review: Works well if you already have a prime subscription
author: joeg

review: Fire stick performing as advertised,very satisfied with purchase.
author: Kindle Customer

review: I already own the original Fire TV (more expensive model), which works flawlessly. I wanted to have the same functionality for another television in my home, but didn't want to spend so much. Therefore, I opted for the less expensive Fire TV Stick model, and I have to say that it is as robust as its bigger sibling. I highly recommend it.
author: Emilio Rodriguez

review: While it works well, it falls short of the Roku by not offering apps such as HboGo, Acorn, Fxnow.
author: Justin McKenna

review: Works great! The included adapter made it fit perfectly.
author: CHARLES KEEGAN

review: Easy to install and so easy to navigate!!!  Love it!!!!!
author: Janett Burns "Steve R."
